scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts two figures kneeling. One figure, dressed in a blue robe adorned with gold trim, has feathered wings and appears to be an angel. The other figure, wearing a pinkish-red robe, is looking upwards with hands clasped in prayer. They are positioned against a decorative gold background with a grid pattern of blue and orange circular motifs. The ground beneath them is rendered in green and grey.
